fusion.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a combination of separate qualities or ideas
fusion.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Her work is a fusion of several different styles.
the best fusion cuisine in the whole of Vancouver
fusion.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a physical combination of separate things
fusion.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: the energy that comes from the fusion of hydrogen atoms
fusion.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a type of music which mixes jazz with other types of music, especially rock
